title: NFL draft, Packers, Patriots, Eagles, Michael Jordan
itunes:title: NFL draft, Packers, Patriots, Eagles, Michael Jordan
description:
Colin discusses the NFL draft, why he thinks the Packers are not building around Aaron Rodgers, why he feels the Patriots don't draft well, his thoughts on the Eagles drafting Jalen Hurts, and why he has so much respect for Michael Jordan. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Peter King, and Roy Williams.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
